name: NSSF-CON.05
query:
SELECT  	ss.company                         	AS "Company::", 
			CONCAT_WS(' ', 'P O Box', p_o_box) 	AS "Company Address::", 
			ss.employee                        	AS "Emp ID::", 
			ss.employee_name                   	AS "Employee Name::", 
			SUM(ss.gross_pay)                  	AS "Gross Pay:Currency:", 
			SUM(ss.gross_pay * 0.2)            	AS "Contribution:Currency:", 
			emp.pension_fund_number            	AS "Membership No::", 
			np.payment_date                    	AS "Payment Date::", 
			np.payment_method                  	AS "Payment Method::", 
			np.payment_reference_number        	AS "Ref No.::",
			social.value			   		   	AS "NSSF Employer No:Data:0",
			social_office.value			   		AS "NSSF Office:Data:0",
			pobox.value			   		   		AS "P O Box:Data:0",
			city.value			   		   		AS "City:Data:0",
			date_format(ss.start_date, '%%M %%Y') AS "Contribution Month:Data:0"
FROM    	`tabSalary Slip` ss	LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabSalary Detail` sd ON sd.parent = ss.name 
				LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabEmployee` emp ON ss.employee = emp.name AND emp.pension_fund = 'NSSF' 
				INNER JOIN      `tabCompany` cp ON ss.company = cp.company_name 
				LEFT OUTER JOIN `tabNSSF Payments` np ON np.payroll_month BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s 
				JOIN            `tabSingles` social ON   social.doctype = "Payware Settings" AND social.field = "social_security_fund_registration_number"
				JOIN            `tabSingles` social_office ON   social_office.doctype = "Payware Settings" AND social_office.field = "social_security_fund_registration_district"
				JOIN            `tabSingles` pobox ON   pobox.doctype = "Payware Settings" AND pobox.field = "p_o_box"
				JOIN            `tabSingles` city ON   city.doctype = "Payware Settings" AND city.field = "city"
WHERE   	sd.salary_component = 'Basic' 
AND     	ss.docstatus = 1 
AND     	ss.start_date >= %(from_date)s 
AND     	ss.end_date <= %(to_date)s 
GROUP BY	ss.employee_name, 
			ss.designation, 
			emp.gender, 
			emp.date_of_birth 
HAVING  	SUM(ss.gross_pay) > 0
